name: Python Basics Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of the basics of Python programming language.

questions.questionText: What is the extension of a Python file?
Which of the following is an example of a Python library?

name: Python Data Types Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of data types in Python programming language.

questions.questionText: What is the data type of 'hello' in Python?
What is the data type of 3.14 in Python?
Which of the following is a sequence data type in Python?

name: Python Functions Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of functions in Python programming language.

questions.questionText: What is a function in Python?
options: A group of related data items
A set of instructions to perform a specific task

questions.questionText: What is the difference between a parameter and an argument in a Python function?
options: There is no difference, they are the same thing
A parameter is a variable in a function definition, while an argument is a value passed to a function
An argument is a variable in a function definition, while a parameter is a value passed to a function
A parameter is used for iteration, while an argument is used for computation

questions.questionText: Which keyword is used to define a function in Python?
